etri.sdn.controller.module.linkdiscovery

Interface ILinkDiscoveryService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IService
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    OFMLinkDiscovery

    public interface ILinkDiscoveryService
extends IService
    This interface is used to define a service that OFMLinkDiscovery should implement. This file is no different with Floodlight version.
    Author:
    bjlee
